segment.source: Mapping Your Deployment Goals to a Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Design (Windows 10)
segment.target: Mapping Your Deployment Goals to a Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Design (Windows 10)

segment.source: Mapping Your Deployment Goals to a Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Design
segment.target: Mapping Your Deployment Goals to a Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Design

segment.source: Mapping Your Deployment Goals to a Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Design
segment.target: Mapping Your Deployment Goals to a Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Design

segment.source: After you finish reviewing the existing Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals and you determine which goals are important to your specific deployment, you can map those goals to a specific Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design.
segment.target: After you finish reviewing the existing Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals and you determine which goals are important to your specific deployment, you can map those goals to a specific Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design.

segment.source: Important: The first three designs presented in this guide build on each other to progress from simpler to more complex.
segment.target: Important: The first three designs presented in this guide build on each other to progress from simpler to more complex.

segment.source: Therefore during deployment, consider implementing them in the order presented.
segment.target: Therefore during deployment, consider implementing them in the order presented.

segment.source: Each deployed design also provides a stable position from which to evaluate your progress, and to make sure that your goals are being met before you continue to the next design.
segment.target: Each deployed design also provides a stable position from which to evaluate your progress, and to make sure that your goals are being met before you continue to the next design.

segment.source: Use the following table to determine which Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design maps to the appropriate combination of Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals for your organization.
segment.target: Use the following table to determine which Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design maps to the appropriate combination of Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals for your organization.

segment.source: This table refers only to the Windows Firewall with Advanced Security designs as described in this guide.
segment.target: This table refers only to the Windows Firewall with Advanced Security designs as described in this guide.

segment.source: However, you can create a hybrid or custom Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design by using any combination of the Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals to meet the needs of your organization.
segment.target: However, you can create a hybrid or custom Windows Firewall with Advanced Security design by using any combination of the Windows Firewall with Advanced Security deployment goals to meet the needs of your organization.

segment.source: Protect Devices from Unwanted Network Traffic
segment.target: Protect Devices from Unwanted Network Traffic

segment.source: Restrict Access to Only Trusted Devices
segment.target: Restrict Access to Only Trusted Devices

segment.source: Restrict Access to Only Specified Users or Devices
segment.target: Restrict Access to Only Specified Users or Devices

segment.source: Require Encryption When Accessing Sensitive Network Resources
segment.target: Require Encryption When Accessing Sensitive Network Resources

segment.source: To examine details for a specific design, click the design title at the top of the column in the preceding table.
segment.target: To examine details for a specific design, click the design title at the top of the column in the preceding table.
